root.name: TinTin: Destination Adventure
root.description: GameplayThe gameplay is similar to the previous two TinTin games (Prisoners of the Sun and TinTin in Tibet), with the exception in some parts where the player can operate vehicles.Aside from this the only other enhancement is the use of full 3D for the game.LocationsThe places visited in the game are from the comic booksThe Black IslandRed Rackhamâ€™s TreasureThe Land of Black GoldExplorers on the MoonFlight 714 to Syndey
